sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SAHLAYDUN, a town of the Birman empire, in the province of Pegu, and situated on the Irrawaddy river. It carries on a considerable trade in teak-timber with Rangoon, anil has also a land-communication with the sea- coast of Arracan. Long. 94. 40. E. Lat. 18. 35. N.
